name: Alexandra Murray
text: David S**** the owner inspected a drainage easement on our property and was able to advise us as homeowners the steps to correct drainage and erosion control issues. He provided several ideas and advised us to contact the county and builder to have these issued corrected. He has all the technology to take aerial footage and soil samples to obtain accurate information and is incredibly knowledgeable! He went above and beyond for us and I know he truly had our families best interest. I would recommend DSLD to anyone without a doubt.

name: Laura Witcher
text: I called several companies about an immediate project and possible other projects. When David Sharp showed up at our door we had a pleasant surprise. Not only is he a great person, but he was my husband’s youth director years ago and they got to have a little reunion. DSLD filled in and tiled a front porch that was formerly a long planter box. We had previously spoken to many others about the project and never was happy with the response, the quotes, or how the others listened to what we wanted. We are so pleased with DSLD’s work, how quickly they completed the project, how well they communicated with us, and the quoted amount for the work that they have us as customers from now on! Plus all the staff are very friendly and helpful!

resp.text: It was so good to meet you Laura and catch up with James!  Thank you for your kind words and we look forward to working with you in the future.

name: Chase Carter
text:
This review is kind of overdue,  but getting the pool ready for this season reminded me I’ve yet to write one.  DSLD installed a Desjoyaux pool at our house last spring.  From design work (Stephen) to the crew that installed our pool (PM Austin) we were very pleased and our backyard was completely transformed.  Their vision for our backyard and the product they delivered completely surpassed (in a good way) the one we thought possible.  Our project consisted of not just the pool install, but rerouting/hiding a drainage ditch that went through the middle of our yard, regrading the entire backyard, sprinkler install and pouring a parking pad.  DSLD was capable of handling the entire project without having to contract out things here or there so it was nice only having to deal with one company from start to finish.

And probably most importantly David and his team are good people.  5 stars and highly recommended.

name: Robert Anaforian
text:
DSLD has earned our highest recommendation. Throughout our project David and the entire team demonstrated integrity, creativity, top notch customer service, professionalism, and premier craftsmanship.
You will not be disappointed!

name: Rob Sharp
text:
DSLD traveled to mine and David’s mom’s house. The backyard was approx 110 ft and open to all, no privacy. I watched the crew scalp the old lawn and graded down to a more level surface. Then they planted about 20 trees which served as a privacy fence. Mixed in a variety of bushes and plants. I could only imagine how it would look when all planting matured. They laid new sod and it looked like a picture from Home and Garden magazine.

Through the years I have visited my brother and his family and he’d take me on job sites with him. I was amazed to see the complexity of installs he was undertaking. The attention to detail David gives to each install is second to none. I could write a few pages just on that subject. (But I won’t) His new store AquaScapes was an overnight success. I tribute this to David’s insight of products as well as knowledge of the industry. Offering fountains, fish ponds, fish of course and swimming pools from the store, has only broadened the DSLD complete landscape portfolio.

I have to tip my hat to my brother and his team of professionals. His sons Zachary, Miles and Cole play a major part in this well oiled machine as they each have a part in most every install. They are dependable, punctual and treat each job as if it were being installed on their property.

Rather you have DSLD perform their expertise on your yard or not, you have to admire how far they have come.

Wishing you all continued success!

name: Daisy Hawkins (Hope Series)
text: The most professional one stop shop for all that I needed.  This team landscaped the front and back, built a screened in patio.  Created and installed all new flagstone walkway and side patio and surrounding my new beautiful water fountain from their Aquascapes location at Hanna's Garden on 280.  Then painted my entire exterior on my house and addition.  Very professional, hard-working, and eager to accommodate any requests I had.  Highly recommend this group for your outdoor hardscape and landscape.  I loved not having to be the contractor on all these things.  They handled all for me.

name: Laerke Costov
text: Run as fast as you can in the opposite direction! Avoid at all costs!

name: R Daniel Chang
text: David came by for our consultation on time. He was very attentive to our questions and concerns. We're still in the process of making final decisions on contractors and builders but dsld is certainly at the top of the list.

name: Steve Skelton
text:
I could not be more pleased with this company! They are professionals in every sense of the word.
They have done multiple projects for myself and my wife. They are what I would call...outdoor wizards!
They have installed amazing landscape lighting for us, completely redesigned our shrub and flower beds, and installed the most awesome landscape masonry borders I’ve ever seen. I have a large fountain in one of the shrub beds in the front of my house. Mind you, this thing weighs like a bazillion lbs. I was recently trying to clean it out and get it ready for Spring and Summer. I accidentally let the bowl tip off the pedestal. Well, I tried to lift it up and get it back on the pedestal. I suppose I’m not as young as I used to be, because I couldn’t budge it. I really didn’t know what to do, so I called DSLD and asked if they could come by and get this monster back on the pedestal. It wasn’t more than a day later, when I got in from work when I noticed that my fountain was sitting upright, filled with water, just waiting to be plugged in. When I called Zach Sharp, ( a great young man by the way) to ask what I owed them, he absolutely refused to take a cent, saying it only took a few minutes and I could not get them to take anything for their time and trouble. In today’s world, qualities like that are rare. If you ever need any type of landscape architecture, a pool, anything “outdoorsy”,
These are the guys. They are 5 stars in every category and I could not give them a higher recommendation.
Don’t waste your money on shoddy work! Call DSLD . They are definitely the best!

Steve Skelton
Dunnavant Place at Highland Lakes

name: Jason Hall
text: DSLD does excellent work. It’s almost hard to believe it’s the same yard from before to after. The yards they have worked on and completed are the type of yards you would see on TV or magazines the quality is so good.

name: Heather Brown
text:
DSLD rescued our backyard garden! In March, we used another landscaping service to prepare landscaping beds and plant hydrangeas, roses, azaleas, camellias, gardenias, etc. The beds were not properly prepared, and the plants became diseased, stressed, and began to die very quickly. We also had a serious drainage problem.

DSLD determined why our new plants were failing, recommended solutions, and implemented their plan; amending the soil and replanting the plants we already had. They also solved our drainage problem. Now, we have a gorgeous backyard!!!

We highly recommend DSLD!

name: Lauren Clemons
text: Great communication and presentation of information on their entire pool building and landscape design process!  I appreciate the quick responsiveness and the professionalism so far.  Excited to get started on our back yard transformation project!!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind reply. Look forward to working with you on the design.

name: Hughes Home
text: DSLD repaired our pool and got it running before spring was over. They did an outstanding job and were generous with their time and efforts. They have also provided valuable ILP lessons for the youth on our camous that will help them get started once they graduate HS.

resp.text: Thank you very much for your kind remarks. Our owner David Sharp enjoys teaching the independent living classes at kings home, and we were all happy to rebuild your swimming pool and wish you many years of swimming recreation and enjoyment.

name: Drew Ellis
text: Genuinely good people and very good at what they do. Arturo and his crew were very professional and made sure everything was done right. Stephen was easy to communicate with and a pleasure to work with. You get what you pay for with this crew.  We love our new backyard and patio.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Mr. Ellis. From design to implementation, It was a pleasure working with you and your family to bring your backyard living space to life!

name: Joe Limbaugh
text: Even though we did not select them as part of our bid process, they were very professional to deal with.

name: Lester Ruttka
text: DSLD does exceptional work, is efficient, fast, and reliable. Whether it is general landscaping or custom design they can't be beat.

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words Mr. Ruttka. It was a pleasure working for you!

name: Annilaurie
text: DSLD did a great job on are yard.  We love our beautiful new beautiful back yard and lighting.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words. It was a pleasure working with you to transform your backyard!

name: William Gilley
text: DSLD sets the standard for professionalism and integrity in creating amazing outdoor spaces. Their team works with you to create designs using the best quality products available. Their crews are efficient and well organized. They are honest and dependable and the quality of their finished work is second to none. I highly recommend using them for your next outdoor project.

name: David & Ann Swanson
text: Very knowledgeable and professional. Great job.  Pool and landscape look fantastic. Would highly recommend

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words Mr. and Mrs. Swanson.

name: Alene Morgan
text: If you are looking for a landscaping company that will give you good professional advice in addition to responding to your specific request, DSLD would be a good bet.  Perhaps the best quality is the attitude of those involved in which you sense they really care to do a good job for you.

name: James Graham
text: I really enjoyed the planning process that DSLD took us through.

resp.text: Thank you! It was a pleasure working with you and your family!

name: Jason Carpenter
text: I have used DSLD numerous times and I am always 110% satisfied with the attention to detail and the final product of their work.  The DSLD team is always courteous, professional and respectful.  If your like me and don't have a vision for your lawn, call DSLD and let them handle it - you will not be disappointed.

name: Script Inspired
text: Very knowledgeable staff. Great care and attention to detail was taken when installing sod in my yard. Fantastic finished product!

name: bill rodgers
text: Did what they said they would. Mason is a true artist. Offered great design and additions as we went. Jason was a wonderful asset to have on my job. Will mark them as KEEPERS.

name: qb1_7 Wanderful1
text: A little arrogant if you ask me

name: Bryan Chace
text: Knowledgeable, professional, and excellent workmanship. Attentive service and estimates. They do what they say, and do it very well.

name: Jamie Berry
text: Great company to work with. Very knowledgeable and efficient. All around great group, I highly recommend.

name: mary pickett
text: We had just moved into our new custom home but had questions about some of the builder's construction decisions.  We wanted a neutral opinion.  We called DSLD and they promptly came to access our questions and did a complete review of the home.  Afterwards, we were provided a concise review of construction and systems.  They explained why the builder did certain things and advised on how to get things investigated/repaired.  I recommend DSLD.

name: tim roberts
text: I have performed a lot of work around these guys and they are the best in the business. I am an electrician and many time other trades only care about thier part  job. Their masons work with all the trades to make sure the customer gets the best project possible. I have never seen anything but  jobs of the highest quality around these guys and look forward to working around them again down the road.

name: Lou Eppolito
text: Design work was functional and attractive. Implementation was first rate. DSLD stands behind its work. Overall, a great experience!

name: Ron Boisclair
text: Exceptional client service, workmanship and a great team. Working with DSLD owner David Sharp was a pleasure. He responded to my inquiry within a day and met with me within a week to discuss options for landscape and drainage work on my Highland Lakes home--the $100 up-front consult fee was a worthwhile investment, and was applied to to the cost of my project. Work included expanding, grading, and sodding (Zoiysa) the backyard, which included construction of a 70 foot concave curved/step-graduated wall, installing a new drainage system along and under the driveway, and adding an external sump pump well and pump to move water from a tied-in roof downspout and overhead deck drain. DSLD completed the project in approx. 2 weeks.  Good communications throughout, with detail breakdown of proposal costs.  Definately recommend.

name: Stan Ingram
text: Pleasure to work with.  They did everything they promised in good time.

name: Jim Mason
text: Very professional staff. They assisted me in any way possible and were sure to follow up on my inquiry to see if I needed any additional help.

name: Brian Parrish
text: Professional, respectful, hard-working team that delivers top notch service! You will be happy with the results and so will your neighbors!

name: Justin Abercrombie
text: DSLD takes pride in the quality of work for each and every job. The company as a whole is very friendly, and makes the experience welcoming as well as rewarding.

name: Tim Kirksey
text: Staff is very courteous and professional. A fun place to shop!

name: David Sharp
text:
As an owner/operator I enjoy meeting new and old clients and working with some of the finest people I know.  Our employees stay put!  We have folks here going on three decades and and counting.
Don't take my word for it, call us today and put our professional team on your next project!

name: Russell Baker
text: Knowledgeable crew always showed up as scheduled and happy to coordinate their work with other Contractors. Pricing is not the cheapest but you get what you pay for

name: Nelson TAYLOR
text: Terrible follow up!!! I contacted DSLD for a replacement pool liner after visiting Aquascapes store. They would not provide photos of their work, references etc. Very obvious they are unqualified for such projects!

resp.text: Mr. Taylor, we apologize for our untimely follow up on your request.  You caught us at a very busy time and we have since hired the requisite personnel to ensure this does not happen again. At your inconvenience, please stop by AquaScapes anytime for a $25 credit on anything in our store.

name: Ed Bartlett
text: Extremely professional.  Cutting edge designs.  Top quality construction.

name: Lester Colindres
text:
It's been great working for DSLD
family oriented company.
Lots of opportunities to learn new skills.

name: Brady Pugh
text: DSLD is a dependable family owned and operated business that has unmatched customer satisfaction. Attention to detail, knowledge, and integrity are some of the values that this quality landscape company prides themselves in.

name: Griffin Hansen
text: Great landscaping company, and their chicken yard on Dunnavant is a lot of fun to see every day.

name: Leo Hernandez
text: Dsld gave me a great introduction to customer service and taught me about the workings of a successful small business. the company is family owned and operated, and it feels like you are with family when you are at work. Love Dsld and would recommend to anyone.

name: markus frederick
text: Love working here! I get time off for my school and i like how it's family operated!

name: James Martindale
text: Great family owned business, very professional work!! Quality at its finest!!

name: Kelly Matthews
text: Great Administration and an Excellence Driven Team

name: Michael Crump
text: We love how the project turned out and highly recommend DSLD.

name: Greg James
text: Great guys.  They do fantastic work!!

name: Frank McClure
text: Very professional, fixed my drainage issues, and repaired landscaping to desired condition.  Would use again.

name: KEITH JEWELL Straight-Line PARKING LOT MAINTENANCE
text: Great service good people to do business with

name: Cooper White
text: Very professional and got the job done quickly!

name: R Heffner
text: Phillips

name: Jonathan H
text: We contracted Rob and his crew to remove over 50 trees from our property. We had talked to several companies but only Rob had the equipment needed to remove the trees, remove the stumps, and then level and grade the ground so it was ready for sod. They were able to do it all instead of hiring 3 different companies. That saved us a lot of money and the work was performed flawlessly. They transformed by backyard from an unusable jungle to a clean blank slate ready for sod. We love our backyard now thanks to Rob and his Crew!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words. We were glad to be a one stop job to remove those 60 or so trees. We are looking forward to see how that grass you chose performs. Hopefully it can be a new favorite for us to recommend to future clients. Thanks again for your business!

name: Josh Casey
text: I needed some land cleared for a building and they came out on new years day and got to work. They cleared out several trees and leveled up my lot for the building and finished the job in two days. I was very pleased with the work they did. I would definitely recommend them and use them again in the future.

resp.text: Thanks for the Awesome review Josh! Looking forward to seeing the project after it is all complete with the new building!

name: Vanessa Howell
text: I highly recommend! The guys were super professional,  did excellent work, and stayed on budget.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review! We enjoyed watching the transformation. Can’t wait to see the new house!

name: Amy B
text: Rob and his crew did an amazing job on our pond and clearing the surrounding banks from years of overgrowth. We could not be more pleased with the outcome!

resp.text: Thank you for the review! We enjoyed the job and what an amazing difference! Let us know when you are ready to start the next phase and we will be happy to help. Thank you again for your business.

name: Robin Wilkie
text: If you want to have a pond, this is the place to go! They have it all! Lotus blooms aren't ready yet, but the water lilies are beautiful! Great place to take a day date on!

resp.text: It was GREAT to meet you Robin!  Thank you for the 5 star review!!!

name: Shawn Gaines
text: Great place if you in the pond and koi hobby

resp.text: Thank you Shawn, your review means a lot to us!

name: Donald Quinnn
text: The best place to get all you fish needs

name: Susan
text: This place has AWESOME fish and supplies!!! All the employees and owners are super nice, friendly and helpful!!!

resp.text: Hi Susan, thank you so much for the 5 star review! Customers like you make our day :)

name: Jennifer Price
text: The woman was wonderful! She helped me pick my lotus, and answered all my questions

resp.text: Thank you Jen!  It was my pleasure to help you with your beautiful lotus! ~ Tammie

name: Dennis Hessler
text: These friendly folks put in a beautiful pond for me at a good price and with attention to detail that surprised me. One of the few businesses I've ever worked with that returned after the final payment was made to do some touch-ups. They made sure my lights worked and flushed out the pond. These people keep their word, they know what they're doing, they're prompt, and they're friendly. Thanks Mark and Mike and Tammie. Highest recommendation.

resp.text: Thank you Dennis and Kae for your amazing review! We truly enjoyed working with you and love your beautiful Pond. If you need any help in the future you know we will be here for you.

name: Steve Vining
text: Amazing service and I got my 2 favorite fish, Tess

resp.text: Hey Tess, we appreciate you!  Keep us posted on your fin babies.

name: Catherine Poore
text: Beautiful ponds/business!

resp.text:
Hi Catherine,
We appreciate your 5 star rating!  We hope to see you again soon.
Cheers, Tammie

name: Beverly Willams
text: I have done business with them for 2 years and have been extremely pleased. They put in a pond for me and have been great about answering any questions and always have really pretty good quality fish to choose from. I also use their maintenance service and it has been wonderful. Dependable

resp.text: Thank you so much for the awesome review! Much appreciated.

name: Bree Gary
text: Beautiful ponds!

resp.text: Hi Bree - Thank you so much for the 5 star review!  We appreciate you and hope to see you at the shop again soon.

name: Kelsey Little
text: very zen like, they are professional and have a large selection of plants as well as fish

resp.text: Thank you very much, your kind words mean a lot to us!

name: Kenneth Richardson
text: Fast friendly service

resp.text: We appreciate the 5 star review Mr. Richardson!  Many thanks!

name: Wanda Clark
text: Very nice and helpful woman.  Got down on knees to scoop mosquito fish out.

resp.text: Thank you so much for rating us, Wanda.

name: Rachell Dees
text: The coy fish are absolutely beautiful !

resp.text: Thank you Rachell, we appreciate you.

name: James Dyess
text: Have bought many pond plants and some fish here and have been very satisfied.

resp.text: Thank you James.

name: Taylor Bartlett
text: Very helpful employee and lovely plants/fish.

resp.text: Thank you so much. It's our pleasure!

name: Autumn Thatcher
text: Always great customer service  and products!

resp.text: Thanks for taking the time to rate us! Glad you were happy with our services.

name: Marvin Ginns Sr
text: Beautiful pond exhibits and a wealth of knowledge. If you are planning a pond or water garden, you should make it a high priority item to talk to these guys. It will most certainly save you a lot of grief and money.

resp.text: Thank you Marvin!  Your review means a lot to us!

name: Doug Morgan
text: These guys are flakes.  I would not recommend doing business with them.

resp.text: Hi Doug - We are sorry that you didn't have a positive experience with us.  Pond Elegance is under new ownership as of April, 1 2019 with great reviews.  We would love an opportunity to show you our new business.

name: John Waldron
text: If you want a.pond you need to go here before you buy

resp.text: Thank you for the great rating John! We appreciate you.

name: Jamarcus Eirby
text: Loved it

resp.text:
Hi Jamarcus,
Thank you for the 5 star rating!!! We appreciate you and look forward to serving you in the future.
Cheers, Tammie

name: Annett Bosarge
text: Love this place...

resp.text: Hi Annett - thank you for your review!  We love having you here.

name: jessica Valentine
text: Very helpful.  Clean. Will be going back !

resp.text: Thank you very much for the great feedback.

name: Elvis Duke
text: Liked

resp.text: Hi Elvis - thank you for the review, we really appreciate it!  Tell us what we can do to earn your 5 star review.

name: alan briggs
text: Outstanding workmanship and very  professional, informative, and all around great  people! !!!! Thank you Neal, Mike, and David!!!!  David is a true  artist with stone  and rocks! !!!!!!!!!  Thanks  again!!!!!!!#!#

resp.text: Glad to hear you liked how everything turned out, Alan.

name: Carmen Eubanks
text: Great

resp.text: Thank you Carmen!

name: Angel Folker
text: Awesome place

resp.text: Thank you for visiting us and for the rating Angel!

name: Mariah Mccovery
text: I love this place

resp.text: And we love having you visit!

name: Michael Henderson
text: Hi quality

name: Dawn Wheeler
text: Andy's gardens are beautiful, each one unique, but all are beautiful!

name: Caroline Sanstead
text: This is not readily apparent anywhere, but they do not have a public storefront. No sign, no front door, no one on-site. It was not clear on the website if they were just remodeling, temporarily closed for the season, or simply no longer operating a store. Don't waste your time driving out there if you're looking for pond supplies.

name: Jeff Thomas
text:
Under new ownership,  great experience.
The staff was very helpful and the store was nice and uncluttered. I will return.

name: Debbie Haywood
text: Nice friendly staff. Beautiful fish! The fountains are gorgeous. Its a bit pricey.. but you get what you pay for, right

name: Steven Thompson
text: Staff was nice, but the butterfly koi that we purchased Saturday died yesterday and they only have a 48 hour policy on fish death. If you spend over a hundred dollars on a fish and it dies in 3 days you are out of your money for nothing.

name: A A
text: These guys are top notch. Highly recommend.

name: Jeremiah Johnson
text: Great pond plant selection, but too pricey on the fish and supplies.

name: Chesley Crain
text: Great selection. Staff was super helpful!

name: Ismael Torres
text: Anything you need for your garden

name: Sherry Rousseau
text: Great selection

name: Clayton Crawford
text: Wonderful world of plants

name: niki ferguson
text: Shayne and his crew did a great job building our retaining wall and walk way for us.  They showed up on time, clean up after themselves and were really nice. Our pavers that are around our pool got discontinued and Shayne went above and beyond to try to find pavers that matched as close as possible to what we had.

name: Alec Ross
text: Needed a footer added on to my existing patio. Came in at a great price and quick response. Always friendly great quality of work. The team that came out was great and worked fast. Will use again! Give them a call!

name: LeWaire Waycaster
text: Bayshore has completely landscaped our home including custom lighting and a circle drive. I wish I could give them the stars!! They always go above and beyond to provide excellence.

name: tiffany passarelli
text: Very unhappy!  12 months later and we are still waiting on major warranty work to be performed.  Shayne will not return our phone calls, text messages or emails. He took our money and ran....

name: Steve Perry
text: Shayne and the guys at Bayshore have done several projects (flower beds, fire pit, pergola, sod replacement, sod replacement and maintenance) at our house and have done a wonderful job. Shayne is great at providing attention to detail and ensures that you are pleased with the project. Highly recommended!!!

name: Amymarie McKnight
text:
Bayshore Landscapes has been maintaining my lawn for over 6 years. The guys are hard workers & always do a professional job!  They have great costumer service skills. I highly recommend Bayshore Landscapes!!

Amy McKnight

name: Kevin Brane
text: The folks at Bayshore Landscapes put in an outdoor kitchen for us. Excellent job, timely and professional. We were very pleased. Highly recommended.
